channel.title: CVE Feed for sujin2f -- 2D Tag Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sujin2f -- 2D Tag Cloud

item.title: CVE-2024-9670|2024-10-14T15:17:13.748Z -- sujin2f -- 2d%20tag%20cloud
item.description: The 2D Tag Cloud plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 6.0.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-9670|2024-10-12T05:39:42.209Z -- sujin2f -- 2d%20tag%20cloud
item.description: The 2D Tag Cloud plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 6.0.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
